Title: Series: Library of Ashurbanipal
Description: Fragment of a clay tablet, text of Esarhaddon, 13 + 10 lines of inscription, Neo-Assyrian. Portion out of the middle, part of an inscription of Assurbanipal concerning his campaign in Egypt.
Bibliographic references: Bezold 1896a / Catalogue of the cuneiform tablets in the Kouyunjik Collection of the British Museum
